# Identifying ceRNA interactions and ncRNA synergistic competitions across 31 malignant tumors

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
# Load input data of 31 malignant tumors, the Pan-Cancer.RData can be downloaded from https://drive.google.com/file/d/10TLHVYUy639dyz2LGKV-TRLM_Y_qfYkK/view?usp=sharing
load("Pan-Cancer.RData")
num.cores <- 32
cores <- makeCluster(num.cores)
registerDoParallel(cores)

ACC_index <- which(Pancancer_phenotype[, 2] %in% "TCGA-ACC")
pre_null_model_ACC <- sponge_build_null_model(number_of_datasets = 1e+03, 
	                                  number_of_samples = length(ACC_index))
ceRNet_lncR_vs_mR_ACC <- SC(Pancancer_miRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], Pancancer_lncRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], Pancancer_mRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], miRTarget_lncR_vs_mR, null_model = pre_null_model_ACC)
ceRNet_pseudo_vs_mR_ACC <- SC(Pancancer_miRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], Pancancer_pseudogene_Exp[ACC_index, ], Pancancer_mRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], miRTarget_pseudo_vs_mR, null_model = pre_null_model_ACC)
ceRNet_ACC <- rbind(ceRNet_lncR_vs_mR_ACC, ceRNet_pseudo_vs_mR_ACC)
SCOMNet_ACC <- SCOM(ceRNet_ACC, cbind(Pancancer_lncRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], Pancancer_pseudogene_Exp[ACC_index, ]), Pancancer_mRNA_Exp[ACC_index, ], null_model = pre_null_model_ACC)
```


# Overlap of multiple ncRNA synergistic competition networks

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
Overlap.SCOMNet.all <- Overlap.ceRNet(Input4, overlap.num = 1, type = "least") 
Overlap.SCOMNet.1 <- Overlap.ceRNet(Input4, overlap.num = 1, type = "equal")
Overlap.SCOMNet.2 <- Overlap.ceRNet(Input4, overlap.num = 2, type = "least")
Overlap.SCOMNet.3 <- Overlap.ceRNet(Input4, overlap.num = 3, type = "least")
Overlap.SCOMNet.4 <- Overlap.ceRNet(Input4, overlap.num = 4, type = "least")
```

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
tumor_type <- Pancancer_phenotype[match(rownames(Pancancer_lncRNA_Exp), Pancancer_phenotype[, 1]), ]
hublist <- list(names(Overlap.hub.16))
Overlap_classsification_hub_br <- module.classify(lncRpseudo_Exp, tumor_type, hublist, method = "br")
Overlap_classsification_hub_baseline <- module.classify(lncRpseudo_Exp, tumor_type, hublist, method = "baseline")
Overlap_classsification_hub <- cbind(Overlap_classsification_hub_br[[1]], Overlap_classsification_hub_baseline[[1]])
colnames(Overlap_classsification_hub) <- c("Conserved", "Baseline")
```

# Performance of ncRNA synergistic competition for classifying BRCA subtypes

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
annot <-  data.frame(colnames(Pancancer_mRNA_Exp[BRCA_index, ]))
colnames(annot) <- "Gene.Symbol"
data(pam50.robust)
BRCA.subtype <- molecular.subtyping(sbt.model="pam50", data = Pancancer_mRNA_Exp[BRCA_index, ], annot = annot, do.mapping = FALSE)$subtype
BRCA.subtype <- cbind(names(BRCA.subtype), unfactor(BRCA.subtype))
colnames(BRCA.subtype) <- c("TCGA samples", "BRCA subtype")
BRCA_Exp <- cbind(Pancancer_lncRNA_Exp[BRCA_index, ], Pancancer_pseudogene_Exp[BRCA_index, ])

BRCA.subtype_network_classify_baseline <- BRCA.classify(BRCA_Exp, BRCA.subtype, unique(c(SCOMNet_BRCA[, 1], SCOMNet_BRCA[, 2])), method = "baseline")

BRCA.subtype_network_classify_random <- BRCA.classify(BRCA_Exp, BRCA.subtype, unique(c(SCOMNet_BRCA[, 1], SCOMNet_BRCA[, 2])), method = "br", base.algorith = "RANDOM")

BRCA.subtype_network_classify <- BRCA.classify(BRCA_Exp, BRCA.subtype, unique(c(SCOMNet_BRCA[, 1], SCOMNet_BRCA[, 2])), method = "br")

BRCA.subtype_hub_classify_baseline <- BRCA.classify(BRCA_Exp, BRCA.subtype, names(hub_BRCA), method = "baseline")

BRCA.subtype_hub_classify_random <- BRCA.classify(BRCA_Exp, BRCA.subtype, names(hub_BRCA), method = "br", base.algorith = "RANDOM")

BRCA.subtype_hub_classify <- BRCA.classify(BRCA_Exp, BRCA.subtype, names(hub_BRCA), method = "br")
```
